title: CBC Comedy
text:
Each week, we're selecting our favourite moments from CBC Comedy's sketch comedy lineup: Baroness von Sketch Show, TallBoyz and This Hour Has 22 Minutes.

This week: a Baroness boosts her immune system by eating placenta; TallBoyz serve up Asian dishes with a dash of grade school harassment and show us what it's like being tall at the club; and on 22 Minutes, Canadians want to vote... but if only there was another option.

What was your favourite sketch this week? Tweet us at @CBCTelevision or @CBCComedy and use the hashtag #cbcsketchcomedy.
description: Each week, we bring you some of the best moments from CBC Comedy's sketch comedy lineup. You can stream full episodes on CBC Gem.
